waterSources.name: Ewaso Ng'iro River
waterSources.description: A major river flowing through Northern Kenya, providing water for both agricultural and domestic use.

waterSources.name: Turkana Basin
waterSources.description: An important water source in Northern Kenya, known for its vast groundwater reserves.

waterQuality.status: High levels detected in several water sources.

conservation.title: Rainwater Harvesting
conservation.description: Collect and store rainwater for use during dry periods.

conservation.title: Drip Irrigation
conservation.description: Use efficient irrigation techniques to reduce water usage in agriculture.
